scripts.test: echo "Running infrastructure tests..." && bash -n anvil-lxc-deploy.sh && bash -n security-hardening-2025.sh
scripts.lint: echo "Running shellcheck..." && find . -name '*.sh' -exec shellcheck {} + || echo 'Install shellcheck for better linting'
scripts.security-check:fast: echo "Running fast security checks on changed files..." && git diff --name-only --cached | grep -E '\.(sh|json|md)$' | head -5
scripts.validate: npm run test && npm run lint && npm run security-check
scripts.validate:fast: npm run lint:fast && npm run security-check:fast

author: tonysauce

*.sh: shellcheck --severity=error --format=gcc || echo 'Install shellcheck: sudo dnf install ShellCheck'
